data.title: Plank
data.description: Test your endurance and core strength with this plank challenge. Hold your plank position for as long as you can and beat your personal record!

data.title: Sprint
data.description: Push your limits with this sprint challenge. Cover as much distance as possible in a short burst of speed. A perfect way to test your stamina and power!

data.title: Squat
data.description: Strengthen your legs and glutes with this squat challenge. Perform as many squats as you can in a set time. Aim to improve every day!
